title: Native mobile or tablet application – connectivity
mainAdvice: Let buyers know about your Catalogue Solution’s connection requirements.

minimum-connection-speed.additionalAdvice: Select the minimum bandwidth required for your Catalogue Solution to function.

connection-types.additionalAdvice: Select all of the connection types that will work with your Catalogue Solution.

errorResponse.maxLength: Connection requirements must be 300 characters or fewer
